about_the_game:
About Campaign:

Embark on an epic adventure as King Nirvan assigns a crucial quest to Oggnor following his mind-blowing discovery. As Oggnor ventures forth, he encounters Tychun, Xathos, and Atlonus along the way. The tale unfurls with a tapestry of twists and turns, woven with intricate lore and rich narratives. Each encounter brings new challenges, forging bonds of camaraderie and testing the resilience of our heroes against the relentless tide of adversity. Set against a backdrop of stunning landscapes and immersive environments, this epic saga promises an unparalleled adventure that shapes the destiny of the kingdom. Brace yourself for an unforgettable odyssey filled with heart-pounding action and deep-seated mysteries.

Gameplay Features:
✷ Build and Train Your Units By Using Resources.
✷ Upgrade Skills For Next Level.
✷ Switch Leader Characters.
✷ Character Skins Are Available.
✷ Buy Character Potions and Spell items from shop.
✷ Unlock Chests by Orbs and get common or rare items.
✷ Survive the highest nights among your friends in the Leaderboard.
✷ Variety of Zombies available.
✷ Great Visuals and Extraordinary 3D graphics.
✷ Easy touch controls.
✷ Magnificent background music and sound effects.

name: Stick Infinite Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN8-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-760 (4*2800), AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Master strategic gameplay as you build, train, and upgrade units to protect your statue and king. Switch between leaders, unlock chests, and compete on the leaderboard. With stunning visuals, diverse zombies, and easy controls, it's an epic battle for survival!
